imdb.plot outline: A young, kind, popular and plus-sized girl, faces prejudice due to her size. Later, she marries the village's best Kabaddi player. Their relationship is questioned by the society and family and faces many of circumstances ahead in their life. However, his apprehension does not stop her from overcoming life's battles with grace and aplomb.
imdb.title: Swathi Nakshathram Chothi
plot: A young, kind, popular and plus-sized girl, faces prejudice due to her size. Later, she marries the village's best Kabaddi player.
